name: iOS 16.7 and iPadOS 16.7
available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to break out of Web Content sandbox
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of protocols.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access protected user data
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access edited photos saved to a temporary directory
advisories.description: An issue was addressed with improved handling of temporary files.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access contacts
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An attacker that has already achieved kernel code execution may be able to bypass kernel memory mitigations
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS before iOS 16.7.
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Bill Marczak of The Citizen Lab at The University of Toronto's Munk School and Maddie Stone of Google's Threat Analysis Group

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access protected user data
advisories.description: An authorization issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to delete files for which it does not have permission
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with additional restrictions.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing web content may disclose sensitive information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A user may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to access passkeys without authentication
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with additional permissions checks.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher and weize she

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to identify what other apps a user has installed
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A malicious app may be able to bypass signature validation. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS before iOS 16.7.
advisories.description: A certificate validation issue was addressed.

cves.credit: Bill Marczak of The Citizen Lab at The University of Toronto's Munk School and Maddie Stone of Google's Threat Analysis Group

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive data logged when a user shares a link
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS before iOS 16.7.
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Bill Marczak of The Citizen Lab at The University of Toronto's Munk School and Maddie Stone of Google's Threat Analysis Group
